title: star guardian ahri and ahri
body: When I played with star guardian Ahri vs another Ahri without a skin I could hear Ahri's (without the skin) taunts and quotes. I'm not sure if this is for all skins, and this only happened once.

replies.body:
Hi Chibamoon,

Thanks for taking the time to report this. This issue has been fixed for next patch, so it should stop happening soon!
I've always wondered, how does things like this happen lol

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EAkgI2bB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-09-19T17:49:35.757+0000)
>
> I've always wondered, how does things like this happen lol

It's likely due to how the asset loading is done and how the assets / files are called that makes mixups in game (SG Ahri voice call may point to normal ahri voice asset) - this occurs mostly when both exist in the same game as both sets of files are loaded together (messing with the order of a list and subsequently the numbered call) and mixups can occur.

In trying to simplify it I may have said something dumb but this is what I think is likely to have occurred (had this thing happen when doing coding myself).
